response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our confidence in its significance to your needs and aspirations. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 1350000}
